author: Kristie Hammond
text: I am having the most fabulous time watching the left meltdown!!! I know it's naughty, but i really enjoy poking the bear!!!

author: Kristie Hammond
text: I was thinking about my chats with various people on Twitter and came to realize, the left has no sense of humor!!! Oh wait, i was wrong, they put biden in the White House!!!

author: Kristie Hammond
text: If i step on any one's toes with my comments, it is not personal!!! We are all entitled to our views, but sometimes a argument is refreshing!!!

author: Kristie Hammond
text: The government needs to get out of our lives!!!! Our children belong to us and when we want to teach them about sex,gays or trans, it is up to we the parents, not the radical left!!!

author: Kristie Hammond
text: Biden needs to care about the roits and killing going on in our cities instead of what happened at the capital last year!!!! What ever went on there is nothing compared to what is going on now!!!!

author: Kristie Hammond
text: It's a sad day when a young man cannot defend himself against harm!!!! Everyone seems to forget, the people that were shot were not only there to destroy properly, they were also felons!!!! One of them was a child molester!!!!

author: Kristie Hammond
text: I don't understand how people can condemn anyone trying to defend themselves!!! The prosecutors knew he wasn't guilty, it's more of the left trying to ruin our country!!!!!!!

author: Kristie Hammond
text: Finally, people are standing up for democracy !!!! Kyke Rittenhouse should never have been on trail to begin with!!!!! Iam so happy for this young man!!!
